attributes.action: Forget the 2012 olympics and put the 8 billion pounds towards abolishing poverty here in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Olympics is a waste of money, and the £8 billion cash would be better put towards abolishing poverty here in the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
